name: Latin3
tagline: Big data. Big ideas. Bigger brands.
description:
We think, then we communicate. Technology allows us to obtain the most relevant information about brands and people, thus achieving a deeper understanding.
Finding insights, analyzing opinions, classifying web comments, emails, mobile devices, social networks, display actions, apps and CRM tools, which allow us to understand and categorize behaviors.
This work proposal is what has brought us closer to 16 years for large companies looking for innovative, strategic but human communication that will make their brands even bigger.
